WARN_COUNT.description: Set the warning count for users to be kicked/blocked when the warn limit is exceeded

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Enable/Disable automatic viewing of statuses by the bot (true/false)

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot commands (use multiple prefixes separated by commas)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Phone number(s) of bot admin(s), in international format without +, separated by commas

MODE.description: Work mode for bot. Set to 'public' or 'private'. Public allows everyone to use it.
